segments.text: I see the chaos juxtaposed with the calmness of the garden outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a contrast that leaves me feeling a bit uneasy, knowing something is bound to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, in her apron, is so absorbed that she doesn't hear the ruckus behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how unaware she is of the slips and tumbles waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs higher, his body straining as he reaches for the prize above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who thought cookie-stealing could look so adventurous?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hands are open, full of hope, ready to catch a cookie as he finally succeeds.
segments.speaker: PAR
